Title: CRM Deletion Utility
Description: Takes a FetchXML query and command line based deletion job based on that. It is great for scheduling and automation.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Takes a FetchXML query and command line based deletion job based on that. It is great for scheduling and automation.


Takes a FetchXML query and command line based deletion job based on that. It is great for scheduling and automation.

Future release would ideally add multi-threading for faster performance.

Read the readme file in the bin/debug folder for documentation on how to use.

Do not blame me if you delete something you don't want to delete, Whatever records your query returns will be deleted using this utility****
